## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.7, -10.32)
Consists of:
- Electric pole (position 0.7, -10.32) - currently not plugged into the electric network.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to electric pole placement
- Ensure that the electric pole is placed in a valid position where it can connect to the electric network. Check for nearby entities that may obstruct the placement.
- If an electric pole is not plugged into the electric network, verify that there are other electric poles or power sources within the connection range to establish a network.
